parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.34 </value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Cuts the given rope to the specified length. If some entity was attached to the end of the rope, it will be detached. The rope remains attached to its parent transport and if the length is set to 0 or even negative does not get destroyed. Use [[ropeDestroy]] to remove it completely.<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The rope could only be shortened. If the cut length is greater than current rope length, nothing happens</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropeCut]] [rope, length] </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> rope: [[Object]] - rope object obtained from [[ropeCreate]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> length: [[Number]] - length of the rope in meters after the cut 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[ropeCut]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0, 5];</code> </value></part><part><name>Example1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
